thread.title: Outstanding World Class Hotel
thread.title_full: Outstanding World Class Hotel - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: djsant54
title: Outstanding World Class Hotel
text:
The Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Central Park is a world class hotel centrally located to Broadway, Times Square, meeting places for those coach day trips, outstanding restaurants and three subway stations which allow you to travel to all parts of New York. The location near Times Square and Central Park also allows you to walk to many venues. The rooms are magnificently appointed and our view was outstanding and even better on a snowy day. The kitchenette was an added bonus which allows the busy traveler to reduce costs and prepare light meals on late night returns. The staff are friendly and welcoming and assist in many ways. The breakfast is busy but selections are very good. We definitely recommend this world class hotel to anyone staying in New York.
